data.comment: The match has started at Den Dreef Stadium.
Federico Ricca (Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 19, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Oud-Heverlee.
Eduard Sobol (Brugge) has received a yellow card from Alexandre Boucaut.
Goal! Oud-Heverlee take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Thomas Henry spot-kick..
In the minute 30, At Den Dreef Stadium, Kristiyan Malinov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Frederic Duplus (Oud-Heverlee) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marc Brys (Oud-Heverlee) has taken off Casper De Norre who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Moussa Al-Taamari is the replacement.
In the minute 44, Brugge have been awarded a penalty...
The first-half has ended.
Noa Lang scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Den Dreef Stadium.
Brugge's Noa Lang has been booked in Heverlee.
Goal! Xavier Mercier gives Oud-Heverlee a 2-1 lead in Heverlee.
In the minute 58, Kamal Sowah instrumental with a fine assist.
Charles De Ketelaere is replacing Noa Lang for the away team.
The away team replace Siebe Schrijvers with Ruud Vormer.
In the minute 64, Vaclav Jemelka is on a sub for Mathieu Maertens for Oud-Heverlee.
Brugge make their third substitution with David Okereke replacing Eduard Sobol.
The match has come to a close in Heverlee. The final score is 2-1.
Oud-Heverlee make their third substitution with Barnabas Bese replacing Thomas Henry.
